134 //read father from string
135 inline void CRicciFlowVertex::_from_string()
136 {
137  CParser parser( m_string );
138 
139  for( std::list<CToken*>::iterator iter = parser.tokens().begin() ; iter != parser.tokens().end(); ++ iter )
140  {
141  CToken * token = *iter;
142  if( token->m_key == "father" )
143  {
144  std::string line = strutil::trim( token->m_value, "()");
145  m_father = strutil::parseString<int>( line );
146  continue;
147 
148  }
149  /*
150  if( token->m_key == "rgb" )
151  {
152  std::string line = strutil::trim( token->m_value, "()");
153  line >> m_rgb;
154  continue;
155  }
156  */
157  /*
158  if( token->m_key == "uv" )
159  {
160  std::string line = strutil::trim( token->m_value, "()");
161  line >> m_huv;
162  continue;
163  }
164  */
165  }
166 }

168 //converting vertex uv trait to string
169 
170 inline void CRicciFlowVertex::_to_string()
171 {
172  CParser parser( m_string );
173 
174  if( traits & TRAIT_UV )
175  {
176  parser._removeToken( "uv" );
177  }
178  //if( traits & TRAIT_RGB )
179  //{
180  // parser._removeToken( "rgb" );
181  //}
182  parser._toString( m_string );
183  std::stringstream iss;
184 
185  if( traits & TRAIT_UV )
186  {
187  iss << "uv=(" << m_huv[0] << " " << m_huv[1] << ") ";
188  }
189  //if( traits & TRAIT_RGB )
190  //{
191  // iss << "rgb=(" << m_rgb[0] << " " << m_rgb[1] << " " << m_rgb[2] << ") ";
192  //}
193  if( m_string.length() > 0 )
194  {
195  m_string += " ";
196  }
197  m_string += iss.str();
198 }

209 class CRicciFlowEdge : public CEdge
210  {
211  public:
214  CRicciFlowEdge() { m_length = 0; m_weight = 0; m_sharp = false; };
217  ~CRicciFlowEdge(){};
220  double & weight() { return m_weight; };
223  double & length() { return m_length; };
226  double & inversive_distance() { return m_inversive_distance; };
229  bool sharp() { return m_sharp; };
233  void _from_string()
234  {
235  CEdge::_from_string();
236  CParser parser( m_string );
237 
238  for( std::list<CToken*>::iterator iter = parser.tokens().begin() ; iter != parser.tokens().end(); ++ iter )
239  {
240  CToken * token = *iter;
241  if( token->m_key == "sharp" )
242  {
243  m_sharp = true;
244  break;
245  }
246  }
247  };
251  void _to_string() { CEdge::_to_string(); };
252 
253  protected:
255  double m_weight;
256  //edge length
257  double m_length;
258  //inversive distance
259  double m_inversive_distance;
263  bool m_sharp;
264 };

324 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
325 template< class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
326 class CRicciFlowMesh : public CBaseMesh<V,E,F,H>
327 {
328 public:
329  typedef MeshLib::CBoundary<V,E,F,H> CBoundary;
330  typedef MeshLib::CLoop<V,E,F,H> CLoop;
331  typedef MeshLib::MeshVertexIterator<V,E,F,H> MeshVertexIterator;
332  typedef MeshLib::MeshEdgeIterator<V,E,F,H> MeshEdgeIterator;
333  typedef MeshLib::VertexVertexIterator<V,E,F,H> VertexVertexIterator;
334  typedef MeshLib::VertexEdgeIterator<V,E,F,H> VertexEdgeIterator;
335  typedef MeshLib::VertexFaceIterator<V,E,F,H> VertexFaceIterator;
336  typedef MeshLib::VertexInHalfedgeIterator<V,E,F,H> VertexInHalfedgeIterator;
337  typedef MeshLib::VertexOutHalfedgeIterator<V,E,F,H> VertexOutHalfedgeIterator;
338  typedef MeshLib::FaceHalfedgeIterator<V,E,F,H> FaceHalfedgeIterator;
339  typedef MeshLib::FaceEdgeIterator<V,E,F,H> FaceEdgeIterator;
340  typedef MeshLib::MeshFaceIterator<V,E,F,H> MeshFaceIterator;
341  typedef MeshLib::FaceVertexIterator<V,E,F,H> FaceVertexIterator;
342  typedef MeshLib::MeshHalfEdgeIterator<V,E,F,H> MeshHalfEdgeIterator;
343 public:
344  static unsigned long long m_input_traits;
345  static unsigned long long m_output_traits;
346 };
347 
348 template< class V, class E, class F, class H >
349 unsigned long long CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::m_input_traits = CBaseMesh<V,E,F,H>::m_input_traits;
350 
351 template< class V, class E, class F, class H >
352 unsigned long long CRicciFlowMesh<V,E,F,H>::m_output_traits = CBaseMesh<V,E,F,H>::m_output_traits;
353 
354 typedef CRicciFlowMesh<CRicciFlowVertex, CRicciFlowEdge, CRicciFlowFace, CRicciFlowHalfEdge> CRFMesh;
355 
356 template<> unsigned long long CRFMesh::m_input_traits = EDGE_SHARP| VERTEX_FATHER | VERTEX_RGB;
357 template<> unsigned long long CRFMesh::m_output_traits = VERTEX_UV;
358 };
